MS MCQs

    Pick and ship items from the warehouse in Dynamics 365 Business Central

    »

    1. How can you make sure that a warehouse pick document doesn’t contain more than fifty pick lines?

      On the warehouse shipment, run the Create Pick function, and on the Create Pick request page, enter 50 in the Max. No. of Pick Lines field.

      Create the warehouse pick, and if the document has more than fifty lines, remove the redundant lines.

      Create a pick worksheet for one or multiple source documents. On the Create Pick request page, enter 50 in the Max. No. of Pick Lines field.

      Create a new warehouse shipment, and on the Use Filters to Get Src. Docs request page, enter 50 in the Max. No. of Pick Lines field.


    2. A salesperson sold four speakers of type LS-120. In the sales order, they select the serial numbers to pick and ship to the customer. When picking the items, the warehouse employee notices that the packaging of one of the speakers is damaged, and they want to pick another unit with a different serial number. What does the warehouse employee need to do?

      On the warehouse pick lines, replace the serial number of the unit with the damaged packaging.

      On the warehouse shipment lines, replace the serial number of the unit with the damaged packaging.

      On the sales order, replace the serial number of the unit with the damaged packaging.

      On the warehouse pick, select Item Tracking Lines and replace the serial number of the unit with the damaged packaging.
